title: Short-Term Workshop on Enhancing Teaching Competencies with Technology Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course for acquiring effective teaching methods in smartphone-centric limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can select and utilize at least three free/low-cost technology tools applicable in educational settings
Learners can apply an analytical framework that connects educational objectives with tool functionalities when designing lessons incorporating technological tools.
Learners can execute a process to collect and analyze learner feedback using smartphone-based formative assessment tools.

resources: Free Educational Apps (Google Classroom, Kahoot, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
